name: Puzzle Balls
description:
90% people can't get  to the end! Now YOUR turn! Would you try?

   If you were looking for interesting games about balls, then our puzzle will definitely interest you. We have logic puzzles, solving which you will have a good time.

  • We have more than 50 levels about balls in the game.
  • Beautiful music
  • After going through the whole game, you will experience emotions of delight, because you have to solve complex logical problems
  • Our puzzle levels will make even the most intelligent puzzle.
  • The traps that will burst the balls and stop you from passing the level!
  • Teleports, the interaction with which is built on the logic
  • This is a truly educational game for adults and children. Only units will be able to pass it. In such an interesting game you have not played.
  • Experience emotions!

Special PC EDITION:

  • no ads
  • no need to buy extra life
  • new 10 levels
